question: Who among the following is the director of the Indian feature film named "The Last Color" which was nominated for 92nd Academy Awards in the best picture category?
explanation: The Indian feature film named "The Last Color" which was nominated for 92nd Academy Awards in the best picture category was directed by Vikas Khanna. The main character of the film was played by Neena Gupta. The film plot is based on Varanasi.
